alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Dewey; Major (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 6:24PM CDT until July 07 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northeastern Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Eastern Major County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 623 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Canton Lake, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fairview, Canton, Cleo Springs, Longdale, Canton Lake, Orienta and Isabella. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Canton Lake, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
